title: Hocuos Womens 2025 Round Neck Long Sleeve Ruffle Hem Midi Dress Mesh Ruched Bodycon Formal Cocktail Wedding Guest Dresses
description: Size: S=US(4-6), M=US(8-10), L=US(12-14),XL=US(16-18).Please check the size chart before ordering! This mesh midi dress is made of 95% Polyester,5% Spandex,high quality, soft, lightweight, skin-friendly and stretchy mesh fabric, very comfortable and not see through. Note: The slit of the dress can be pulled up to look as the picture, also can be pulled down to be a modest midi dress.

Unique Design: High-low ruffle hem design, elastic mesh fabric, long sleeve bodycon midi dress, solid color, round neck, back hidden zipper closure, mesh ruched, with stretch lining no see-through, bodycon dress, slim fit, midi dress.
Highlight: This dress featuring a high-low ruffle hem skirt design and gorgeous frills, meshc ruched bodycon fit and midi length, effortlessly accentuates your curves and elongates your figure.
Match: Ladies midi bodycon dress can match with high heels, necklace, handbags to create a glamorous looks. Style good for spring,autumn and winter.

Occasion: This midi dress is versatile enough to be worn for both formal and casual events. Idea for wedding guest,date night, party, prom, birthday, club, cocktail, evening,going out, anniversaries, holiday ,work, graduation， daily wear etc.
